first_translate: stop trying to seduce someone else's man.

hangle: 이 정도에 꼬리를 말 거면 왜 시비를 거는지 몰라.
first_translate: why did she pick a fight if she was going to back down so easily?
second_translate: Why pick a fight if she was going to back down this easily?

hangle: 정신 차려. 어제는 이보다 더 했잖아.
first_translate: get a hold of yourself. yesterday was even worse.
second_translate: Pull yourself together. Yesterday was even worse.

hangle: 네가 하는 거랑 내가 하는 건 느낌이 다르다고….
first_translate: it's different when you do it and when I do it...
second_translate: It feels different when you do it and when I do it...

hangle: 그래도 그냥 입술에 가볍게 했을 뿐이잖아?
first_translate: but it was just a light kiss on the lips.
second_translate: But it was just a light peck on the lips.

first_translate: you have to prepare for tomorrow's expedition!
second_translate: You need to prepare for tomorrow's expedition!
We'll take a short break here!

hangle: 도착할 때까지 유니스 영애와 같은 마차는 절대 못 탈 거야
first_translate: I won't be able to ride in the same carriage as lady eunice until we arrive.
second_translate: I absolutely won't be able to ride in the same carriage as Lady Eunice until we arrive.
Is that such a big deal?

hangle: 좀 친해져서 유니스의 힘을 확인하려 했단 말이다.
first_translate: I wanted to get close to her so I could check her powers.
second_translate: I wanted to get closer to Eunice to gauge her powers.

hangle: 그런데 코앞에서 사람 협박하고, 사랑과 전쟁을 실시간으로 찍어버렸네…
first_translate: but I threatened someone right in front of her and had a dramatic love conflict in real-time...
second_translate: But I threatened someone right in front of her and put on a dramatic love scene in real-time...

first_translate: I wonder what she thinks of me now...
second_translate: I wonder what happened to my reputation...

first_translate: do you like her that much...?
second_translate: Do you like that lady that much...?

hangle: 티 파티 이후로 우리를 볼 때마다 발그레 해지는 것도 그렇고.
first_translate: she blushes every time she sees us after the tea party.
second_translate: She blushes every time she sees us since the tea party.

first_translate: I don't see it at all.
second_translate: I don't get it at all.

first_translate: I made you two date each other, but...
second_translate: I set you two up to be together, and yet...

hangle: 너희 둘이 사랑을 해야 유니스가 각성을 하고 세계를 구한다고….
first_translate: you two have to fall in love so eunice can awaken and save the world...
second_translate: You two need to fall in love for Eunice to awaken and save the world...

hangle: 그 방법이 안 될 것 같으니,
second_translate: Since that method doesn't seem to be working,

hangle: 이번에 가는 죽은 땅에서 뭔가 힌트라도 얻길 바라는 수밖에….
first_translate: I'll have to find some clues in the dead lands...
second_translate: We'll just have to hope to find some clues in the dead lands this time...

hangle: 시그렌, 나 잠깐 어디 좀 다녀올게!
second_translate: Siegren, I'm stepping out for a bit!

hangle: 혼자 있으니까 조금 마음이 편해지는 기분이야.
first_translate: I feel more comfortable being alone.
second_translate: I feel a bit more at ease being alone.

hangle: 행렬에는 사람이 너무 많아서 괜히 지쳐….
first_translate: there are too many people in the procession, and it’s exhausting...
second_translate: There are too many people in the procession, and it's unnecessarily exhausting...

first_translate: what are you doing here, my lady?
second_translate: My lady, what are you doing here?

first_translate: do you want to play with us?
second_translate: How about having some fun with us for a bit?

first_translate: now, now. don't be like that.
second_translate: Come on, don't make a fuss.

first_translate: and go back to your place.

second_translate: Now, you come over here too!

first_translate: he must not recognize eunice and me.
second_translate: looks like he doesn't recognize Eunice and me.

first_translate: then I'll have to show him who I am.
second_translate: Then I'll have to show them who we are.

first_translate: you don't have to get your hands dirty.
second_translate: You don't need to dirty your hands.

hangle: 권터 씨네 사람인 줄은 미처 몰랐습니다.
first_translate: I didn't know she was with you, gunter.
second_translate: I didn't realize you were one of Gunter's men.

hangle: 아가씨는 놔드릴 테니 한 번 봐주시죠.
first_translate: we'll let the lady go, so please let us go.
second_translate: We'll let the lady go, so please overlook this.

first_translate: we'll be on our way now...
second_translate: Now that we've returned the lady, we'll be on our way.

hangle: 너희를 이대로 보내면 내가 공작한테 더러운 꼴을 당해서.
first_translate: if I let you go, I'll have to deal with the duke.
second_translate: If I let you go, I'll have to suffer the consequences from the duke.
Shall I cut off what’s between your legs?
